item.description:
You never know...who you might meet and for what reason.

There are many reasons to network and meet new people.  The best part about this networking event it's informal and Barbara will make sure you meet everyone there!!

If you say yes to any of these items below, then start networking with us!

Would you be interested in:

Making new friends?
Finding a workout buddy?
Meeting someone to play tennis with?
Are you looking for a new job?
Looking to date?
Want to travel, but don't want to go alone?
Does your work involve making new contact? 

 

This event will be scheduled for the first Thursday of each month from 6:30pm-8:00pm.  Locations will vary to accommodate people from different areas.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Barbara or look for the woman holding a single rose.

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: Social and Business Networking
